row.process: ! ------------------------------------------- ! Parameter fÃ¼r JOBI.GETPW_DBTOOLS definieren: ! ------------------------------------------- :SET &ORADB# = "DLLW1&IDT#" :SET &ORAUSER# = "SPIEGELAPP" :SET &PARAFILE# = "&BATCH#_&ORADB#.PAR" :SET &DUMPFILE# = "&BATCH#_&ORADB#.DMP" :SET &EXPSCRIPT# = "&BATCH#_&ORADB#" ! ---------------------------------- :SET &LOGFILE# = "&LOGDIR#/&EXPSCRIPT#.log" :INC JOBI.DBTOOLS_CREATEFOLDER !:INC JOBI.DBTOOLS_DELETEFILE "EDIZIONE" = "&EXP_PATH#/dmp/&DUMPFILE#" :INC JOBI.GETPW_DBTOOLS ! ----------------------------- ! Parameterdatei zusammenbauen: ! ----------------------------- cat << __EOF__ > &PARAFILE# SCHEMAS=BABSY, CD, CRM, IMS, NB, NG, PR, SERV, TUSSY, VU DUMPFILE=&DUMPFILE# REUSE_DUMPFILES=YES DIRECTORY=&DIRECTORY# FLASHBACK_TIME="TO_TIMESTAMP('&TS#', 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS')" LOGFILE=&DIRECTORY#_LOG:&EXPSCRIPT#_&TIMESTAMP_AM#.log CONTENT=DATA_ONLY INCLUDE=TABLE:"IN ( 'TBPVNR_USERID' ,'TCDBW_OP_EV' ,'TCRKONTAKT' ,'TCRSCHL_SMALLINT' ,'TCRSCHL_SMALLINT_Z' ,'TNBPROG_STEU' ,'TNBABLAUF_WERTE' ,'TNBVTR_EREI_VERM' ,'TNBEXT_ANTRAG' ,'TNG_BANK' ,'TBEUSERID' ,'TTS0056' ,'TZZORG' ,'TZZORGSTR' ,'TZZNATION' ,'TVU_GDV' ,'TPRFV_PARTNERDATEN' ,'TPRFV_KOPFDATEN' ,'TPRFV_LAV' ,'TPRFV_PAUSCH_GA_RE' ,'TPRFV_SICHERHEITEN' )" __EOF__ :INC JOBI.DBTOOLS_RUNEXPORT
